1. Google thought it would be the age of visual search. Wrong. It’s AI.  The Dallas Morning News
  2. Google's biggest bet is AI for search, investment chief says  Reuters
  3. Google Search Is Massively Changing In 2025, As Per Google CEO  Trak.in
  4. Alphabet bets big on AI for search  Dig Watch Updates
  5. Meet the woman in charge of keeping Google Search relevant in the AI era  AOL

item.title: New Investment Scam Leverages AI, Social Media Ads to Target Victims Worldwide - The Hacker News
